mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sendfileid,"") AS sendfileid,IFNULL(createdtime,"") AS createdtime, IFNULL(applicant,"") AS applicant,IFNULL(dept,"") AS dept, IFNULL(author,"") AS author, IFNULL(reviewer,"") AS reviewer, IFNULL(print,"") AS print,IFNULL(revision,"") AS revision, IFNULL(copy,"") AS copy,IFNULL(attachmentpath,"") AS attachmentpath, IFNULL(keyword,"") AS keyword,IFNULL(title,"") AS title, IFNULL(content,"") AS content,IFNULL(status,"") AS status, IFNULL(officeprocesstime,"") AS officeprocesstime, IFNULL(officeprocessperson,"") AS officeprocessperson,IFNULL(sn,"") AS sn, IFNULL(date,"") AS date, IFNULL(urgency,"") AS urgency,IFNULL(secret,"") AS secret, IFNULL(qianfa,"") AS qianfa,IFNULL(shengao,"") AS shengao, IFNULL(huiqian,"") AS huiqian,IFNULL(chaobao,"") AS chaobao, IFNULL(chaosong,"") AS chaosong,IFNULL(fa,"") AS fa, IFNULL(approver,"") AS approver,IFNULL(approverdelete,"") AS approverdelete, IFNULL(approvertime,"") AS approvertime, IFNULL(implementperson,"") AS implementperson,IFNULL(implementpersondelete,"") AS implementpersondelete, IFNULL(implementpersontime,"") AS implementpersontime, IFNULL(confirmperson,"") AS confirmperson,IFNULL(confirmtime,"") AS confirmtime FROM sendfile WHERE sendfileid = #{sendfileid}
